main event: A private citizen reported a sighting of a reddish-orange object in Cincinnati, Ohio on 9-7-59.
interesting points: The object exhibited erratic movement, changing altitude and direction rapidly., The observer described the object as fuzzy and emitting no sound., The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 4 minutes., The object was estimated to be about 3/4 inch in diameter at arm's length., The report includes hand-drawn sketches, but no actual photographs.
